pages.text: If Seasons is enabled, Goats take 3 season years to mature.

Goats require $(li)Water $(li)Grass $(li)Food $(br2)If goats are missing water,grass and food, they will eventually die. $(br2)Feed: $(li)Saplings $(li)Leaves $(br2)At max production, goats can be milked up to 4 times per minecraft day. $(br)
